sn8.8:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim addhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
sn8.8:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava bhikkhu nibbanapatisamyuttaya dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti.
sn8.8:1.3: Te ca bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
sn8.8:1.5: “ayam kho bhagava bhikkhu nibbanapatisamyuttaya dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti.
sn8.8:1.6: Te ca bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
sn8.8:1.7: Yannunaham bhagavantam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthaveyyan”ti.
sn8.8:2.1: Atha kho ayasma vangiso utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn8.8:2.4: Atha kho ayasma vangiso bhagavantam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthavi:
sn8.8:7.1: “Kim nu te, vangisa, ima gathayo pubbe parivitakkita, udahu thanasova tam patibhanti”ti?
sn8.8:7.2: “Na kho me, bhante, ima gathayo pubbe parivitakkita, atha kho thanasova mam patibhanti”ti.
sn8.8:7.3: “Tena hi tam, vangisa, bhiyyoso mattaya pubbe aparivitakkita gathayo patibhantu”ti.
sn8.8:7.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma vangiso bhagavato patissutva bhiyyoso mattaya bhagavantam pubbe aparivitakkitahi gathahi abhitthavi:
